question: 3. The nano-sized powders may be observed under TEM by which technique:

answers.a: Using few drops of powder-suspension on carbon coated copper grid
answers.b: By conventional process of slicing, punching, dimpling, and ion beam milling
answers.c: By putting nano-powders on copper grid
answers.d: By making slurry/paste of powders on carbon coated copper grid

7. Double side dimpling is preferred over one-sided dimpling because

answers.a: Double side dimpling has double efficiency of operation
answers.b: Double side dimpling promotes less damage to material
